Logging In

The Composite Application Manager is deployed as a web application in Sun JavaSystem Application Server 9.1.

Anyone who can log in to the Application Server Admin Console can log in to the Composite Application Manager.

To log in to the Composite Application Manager

  1. Ensure that the application server is running.

  2. In a web browser, enter the following URL: http://hostname:port/cam/. Set the hostname to the computer where the application server is running. Set the port to the application server's HTTP port (for example, 8080).

    The login page appears.

  3. Enter a valid username and password.

  4. Click Login.

    The common tasks page of the Composite Application Manager appears.
